name: Dreamfox - Dsifriend
description:
Use Dreamfox to make Firefox's User Interface as small,user friendly and functional as possible.

Instructions:

1)Use add-on compability reporter(If needed)to install Stylish(If you haven't already).

2)Install Dreamfox and enable it.

3)Remove the navigation-bar and move all it's necessary contents to the left of the tabs.

Optional: The add-on buttons look a lot better to the right so place them there.

          Install colorful tabs AND hash colored tabs to help identify them.
